Title: Requires video cameras to be placed on the entrances/exits of all facilities run by the office for people with developmental disabilities
Summary: Requires video cameras to be placed on the entrances/exits of all facilities run by the office for people with developmental disabilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง13.25, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring video cameras in facilities operated by the office for people with developmental disabilities
